circumstances: Robert Wheeler, aged 85 and diagnosed with dementia, was last seen by his grandmother at his home on Commerce Street, Brechin. Concerns arose when he failed to show up for a regular gathering at the community center. Surveillance footage later revealed that he was in contact with a stranger outside 22 Marine Parade Walk, Dundee, possibly discussing travel arrangements. It is suspected that Wheeler intended to visit a location at 41 Dock Street, Dundee, aided by this unknown individual. Despite intensive searches in the area surrounding Turnberry Avenue, Robert remained unreachable. After several days, Robert was found by police on Findcastle Street, Dundee, disoriented but unharmed, having lost his way.
